Leiston Mobile Library Route 8

Contact us:

Manager: Rob Alcraft and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
8A Aldringham Ogilvie Homes 0940 – 1010
8B Thorpeness Almshouses 1020 – 1055
8C Aldringham Mill Hill 1105 – 1120
8D Knodishall Mission Room 1125 – 1155
8E Friston Bus shelter 1205 – 1220
8F Snape Village Hall 1230 – 1250
8G Orford Baron's Meadow 1410 – 1430
8H Orford Market Square 1435 – 1550
8I Sudbourne Bus shelter 1600 – 1610

Calling every 4 weeks on Fridays:

2020: 17 January, 14 February, 13 March, no visit in April, Monday 4 May, 5 June, 3 July, 31 July, 28 August, 25 September, 23 October, 20 November, 18 December
